verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> the second <S%H8145>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

So <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> Now <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> an <S%H430>exceeding<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H4109>journey.<s%>

And <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H3117>day's<s%> <S%H4109>journey,<s%> and he <S%H7121>cried,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5750>Yet<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> shall be <S%H2015>overthrown.<s%>

So the <S%H376>people<s%> of <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> <S%H539>believed<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> and put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> from the <S%H4480>greatest<s%> <S%H1419><s%> of them even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H6996>least<s%> of them.

For <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H5060>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> and he <S%H6965>arose<s%> from his <S%H4480>throne,<s%> <S%H3678><s%> and he <S%H5674>laid<s%> his <S%H155>robe<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> him with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H665>ashes.<s%>

And he caused it to be <S%H2199>proclaimed<s%> and <S%H559>published<s%> through <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> by the <S%H4480>decree<s%> <S%H2940><s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H1419>nobles,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> nor <S%H929>beast,<s%> <S%H1241>herd<s%> nor <S%H6629>flock,<s%> <S%H2938>taste<s%> any <S%H3972>thing:<s%> let them <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H7462>feed,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

But let <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> be <S%H3680>covered<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H2394>mightily<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H430>God:<s%> yea, let them <S%H7725>turn<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4480>way,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in their <S%H3709>hands.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> can <S%H3045>tell<s%> if <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> and <S%H5162>repent,<s%> and turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H4480>fierce<s%> <S%H2740><s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> that we <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H3808>not?<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4639>works,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they <S%H7725>turned<s%> from their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4480>way;<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H1696>said<s%> that he would <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them; and he <S%H6213>did<s%> it <S%H3808>not.<s%>
